Star

A microservices API gateway built on EXPRESS.JS

Fast, Flexible, and Community Driven

Quickstart

img placeholder

Express Gateway 0.10.1 has been released!

  • Simple

    • A single YAML to control it all (pipelines, policies, conditions, actions...)
    • Auto-detect and hot-reload configuration changes
    • Plugin architecture

  • Agnostic

    • A gateway for any service implementation (Node, Go, Java, Python, .NET…)
    • A gateway for any framework (MEAN, Sails, Hapi, Meteor, LoopBack...)
    • A gateway for all use cases (Microservices, Serverless, MBaaS, EAI...)

  • Organic

    • Built on Express Middleware and Node
    • Bundled with most popular modules (passport, node-http, oauth2orize…)
    • Extend with any Express Middleware

  • Portable

    • Run anywhere with Docker in your public or private cloud
    • Works with any orchestrator (Kubernetes, Mesosphere, Swarm...)
    • Plug into your DevOps tooling (Jenkins, CircleCI, Travis...)

Get Started in 1 minute

  1. Specify a Microservice
  2. Expose as an API
  3. Secure API with key

Doug Wilson, maintainer of Express.js

"An API gateway built around ExpressJS is long overdue and the perfect use case for the minimalist strengths of what Express is all about!"
